wjhk.jupload2.upload
Class FileUploadThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      wjhk.jupload2.upload.FileUploadThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Deprecated. Replaced by FileUploadThreadV3

public class FileUploadThread
extends java.lang.Thread

First version of FileUploadThread : unused. Known Bugs: System out of memory Exception. Solution : Nothing! Tryed but didn't work: - Flush the OutputStream once it has outputed 1MB. - Call System.gc() once it has outputed 1MB. - Sleep for 1 Second so that System GC gets a chance to run. Work Around: Breakup the file into smaller ones then upload =)
